remarks: An atom less than or equal to an element covered by 1 is less than the element.  (Contributed by NM, 7-May-2012.)
statement:
1cvratlt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
1cvratlt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
1cvratlt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
1cvratlt.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
1cvratlt.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
1cvratlt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
1cvratlt $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ ( X C .1. /\ P .<_ X ) ) -> P .< X ) $.
